name: Sirka
headline: Noom for Southeast Asia
description: Our program helps people prevent or manage chronic diseases by breaking bad eating habits with plans created by vetted, certified nutritionist / dietitians. Customers get an unlimited chat access to consult with our professionals, and personal recommendations to help adopt new habits into life.

founders.name: Ditto R, Founder
founders.description: I lead product & growth for Sirka.

founders.name: Dito Krista, Founder
founders.description: Dito Krista (DK) is building Sirka, mobile health solution for chronic disease prevention in Indonesia, where he is in charge of commerce and operations. Prior to Sirka, he led insurtech business strategy at OVO, Indonesia's leading payment fintech, and set up joint venture with ZhongAn, one of the largest insurtechs in APAC. DK completed his MBA at INSEAD in 2018. An avid reader and casual programmer, he enjoys playing badminton and building mechanical keyboards outside work.

Yakin sudah sehat? Yuk cari tahu kondisi kesehatanmu sekarang! #MulaiSehatKapanAja ![Homepage Hero Banner](https://www.sirka.io/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhomepage-banner-hero.webp&w=3840&q=75) ## Temukan Solusi Terbaik-mu! Solusi Holistik yang dipersonalisasi khusus untuk kamu dibawah pengawasan Dokter & Nutrisionis Obesity & Weight Management Program penurunan berat badan dengan terapi obat dan pendampingan dengan Dokter Spesialis ![Obesity & Weight Management](https://www.sirka.io/) Metabolic Care Perbaikan kondisi metabolik untuk kondisi diabetes / GERD / obesitas / hipertensi dan penyakit kronis / metabolik lainnya ![Metabolic Care](https://www.sirka.io/) Everyday Health Layanan kesehatan sehari-hari seperti batuk, pilek, alergi, dan keluhan umum lainnya. Didukung dengan akses yang mudah ke Dokter dan Tenaga Medis ![Everyday Health](https://www.sirka.io/) Live Healthier and Longer Personalized & Doctor guided **Perubahan lifestyle** yang lebih sehat dengan pengaturan Pola Makan, Panduan Olahraga, support Suplemen dan Produk Kesehatan ![

Perubahan lifestyle yang lebih sehat dengan pengaturan Pola Makan, Panduan Olahraga, support Suplemen dan Produk Kesehatan

](https://www.sirka.io/) Pendampingan Penuh **24/7 dari Dokter & Nutrisionis** selama program ![

Layanan Holistik untuk perjalanan sehatmu, mulai dari Skrining Kesehatan, Home Care Services, Tes Laboratorium, Penghantaran Obat, hingga Program Preventive-Health.

](https://www.sirka.io/) NEW! ## Medical Weightloss (Sirka Elite Plan) ##### Panduan holistik untuk Weightloss Termasuk pengobatan, panduan makanan dan olahraga selama program ##### Penurunan berat badan lebih cepat Penurunan berat badan 10% lebih cepat daripada program tanpa obat ##### Perawatan lebih komprehensif sesuai indikasi medis* ##### Penggunaan obat yang direkomendasikan langsung oleh Dokter dan dibawah pengawasan praktisi kesehatan ##### Pendampingan 1:1 Pendampingan pola makan & olahraga dari Nutrisionis dan Sport Coach selama program * Kolaborasi dengan klinik partner1 Weight management medications with lifestyle changes lose 3%-12% more of their initial body weight compared to those in lifestyle programs who do not use medication (Pi-Sunyer et al., 2015). A Randomized, Controlled Trial of 3.0 mg of Liraglutide in Weight Management. #### Bunga A ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Proud to be a part of SIRKA! Bergabung dengan SIRKA benar-benar pengalaman positif! Saat mulai, berat badan saya sekitar 73 kg dengan usia metabolik 50-an dan lemak berlebih. Selama 2 tahun, Coach Chandry selalu suportif dan komunikatif, membantu saya tetap di jalur meski godaan malas dan cheating muncul. Tim SIRKA juga fast respon. Senang sekali pernah menjadi bagian dari SIRKA! ![testi img](https://www.sirka.io/) #### Soraya H ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Lowest weight in 14 years! Aku sempat putus asa karena berat badan terus naik, apalagi saat stres. Awalnya skeptis dengan Sirka, tapi setelah coba konsultasi online, aku bisa menjalani diet sehat dengan mudah. Sejak Juli 2024, aku turun hampir 12 kg di pertengahan Oktober—berat terendah dalam 14 tahun. Alhamdulillah, semoga bisa capai target sebelum menikah. Terima kasih, Sirka! ![testi img](https://www.sirka.io/) #### Al Dhiya Adha ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Hassle-free and one-click-away Diet dengan Sirka bantu aku turun 4kg dan yang aku suka di Sirka itu karena dietnya gampang diaplikasikan. Selain itu karna Sirka ada aplikasinya, jadinya gampang juga untuk bertanya kalau kebingungan karena one click away buat tanya sama nutrisionisnya. ![testi img](https://www.sirka.io/) #### Aprilian Tika ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Sirka change my mindset Setelah jalanin program Sirka aku turun 3kg dalam sebulan dan yang jadi favorite aku di Sirka itu bimbingan harian dengan nutrisionis, karena ngebantu kasih pandang kalau hidup lebih sehat bisa berdampak apa dan bisa ngertiin aku dengan memberikan guide yang tepat. ![testi img](https://www.sirka.io/) #### Candra D ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Sirka saved me! Hampir gagal operasi lasik karena gula darah tinggi yang sangat tinggi (172mg/dL), berkat Diabetes Program dari Sirka, gula darah jadi terkontrol dan gak pernah naik lagi. ![testi img](https://www.sirka.io/) #### Bunga A ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ![stars testi](https://www.sirka.io/) ###### Proud to be a part of SIRKA! generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sirka**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Sirka aims to be the Noom of Southeast Asia, focusing on holistic health solutions primarily for obesity and metabolic syndrome. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia, the company comprises a nimble team of nine committed professionals. Sirka offers users personalized nutrition plans crafted by certified dietitians, providing unlimited chat access for consultations. This blend of technology and personal care is where they’re really shining.

**Mission and Services**

Sirka's mission is straightforward: help individuals manage or prevent chronic diseases through the power of good eating habits. Their approach transforms the often-daunting process of lifestyle change into an engaging journey, aided by expert supervision. Whether it’s weight loss, metabolic health improvement, or daily health concerns, Sirka is positioned to provide tailored, physician-supported solutions. Their offerings include:

- **Obesity & Weight Management**: A structured weight-loss program supported by medications and specialist consultations.
- **Metabolic Care**: Addressing conditions such as diabetes and hypertension with comprehensive treatment plans.
- **Everyday Health**: Handling common ailments through convenient doctor consultations.
- **Lifestyle Changes**: Focused guidance on diet, exercise, and health products to encourage healthier living.

**Achievements and User Impact**

Sirka has already connected with over 25,000 users, demonstrating successful outcomes in their health journeys, as highlighted in various positive testimonials. The platform doesn't just offer a diet; it creates an ecosystem of support—everything from health screenings to home care services.

**Future Direction**

With Gustaf Alstromer backing them as a group partner, Sirka is poised for growth in the competitive health-tech landscape. The focus on combining technology with a human touch sets them apart, setting up not just a company, but a supportive community aiming to forge a healthier future for its users.

For more information about their services or to start your health journey, visit their website at [Sirka](https://www.sirka.io/).
